message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.HC 

This paper discusses the field of robotics and AI research, specifically focusing on human-robot collaboration. The paper proposes a model that combines learning robot affordances and word descriptions with statistical recognition of human gestures with vision sensors. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Robotics (cs.RO), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC). Among these, Robotics and Artificial Intelligence are the most likely categories, as they are directly related to the paper's focus on human-robot collaboration and the proposed model for combining different types of knowledge. Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition is also likely, given the use of vision sensors for gesture recognition. Machine Learning is relevant due to the probabilistic nature of the proposed model, and Human-Computer Interaction is relevant due to the focus on effective teamwork between humans and robots.
